About.title: About Me
About.content:
My name is **Kevin Julio Pineda** and I am a **systems engineer and frontend developer with full-stack knowledge**, experienced in building modern web applications using React and Next.js.

I have participated in the development of real-world projects from scratch, integrating backend services, handling complex state management, authentication, validations, and building dynamic interfaces focused on performance, scalability, and user experience.

I have experience working with backend technologies such as REST APIs and databases, which allows me to understand the complete flow of a web application and contribute with a holistic perspective to frontend development.

Throughout my professional journey, I have worked under agile methodologies, applying best practices in architecture, design patterns, and code quality to build maintainable and well-structured solutions.

My goal is to continue growing as a Frontend Developer, strengthen my full-stack skills, and contribute to building impactful digital products for users and businesses.
